activities: In connection with providing services to Tinypass' customers, Tinypass may access personal information about it's clients customers in the EU and Switzerland. Our clients act as the data controller for any such consumer data collected in the EU and Switzerland and subsequently transferred to Tinypass in the United States. Tinypass acts as a data and payments processor on behalf of its customers with respect to such consumer data and accordingly only carries out the instructions of such customers with regard to the collection, processing, and protection of such consumer data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Emaill address, basic information, IP location, credit card information
